column4: does anyone know how i make my 2 ircd servers relink automaticly if one splits ?
- a bit out of scope for this channel...
- its in the ircd config... are you using bahamut or what?  :P
- not familiar with that one.  I'd try #ircd or #unreal.  If those dont exist or people cant help read the help file that came with it.  If you still dont get it try to google or come back to me  :)
